actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 337 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the recognition of gain or loss on sales or exchanges in connection with certain liquidations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude certain long term post production gains from those recognized when collapsible corporations are liquidated. Expands the class of gains recognized for liquidated corporations with net losses for the two year period preceeding liquidation.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 337 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the recognition of gain or loss on sales or exchanges in connection with certain liquidations.
